jd:
Title: Project Manager
Location: Richmond, VA
Duration: 7 Months
Job Type: HYBRID

Key Responsibilities:
- Current Project Management Professional (PMP) from the Project Management Institute (PMI) - OR - VITA PM certification
- Candidate must have a minimum of 10 years experience managing large projects
- Microsoft Office products (Word, Excel, Access, Outlook, Visio, PowerPoint, Project Server)
- The candidate should have 15 years of overall IT experience

Required Qualifications:
- The candidate must have a minimum of 10 years of experience managing large projects and a bachelor's degree.
- Fluency in Project Management tools such as Microsoft Project, Visio, and Office required.
- PMP Certification through PMI
- Experience with VITA’s Commonwealth Technology Portfolio (CTP) system and ECOS process is strongly preferred.
- Experience with Project Management Office methodologies and practices is strongly preferred.
- Experience with the core Commonwealth IT procurement processes (RFP, VITA Statewide Contract, and CAI SOW) is preferred.
